Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp. rerouted near 63rd/ Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses temp. rerouted near 63rd/ Cottage Grove.

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 63rd/Cottage Grove due to Festival near 63rd/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Indiana, 61st, Cottage Grove, 64th, Maryland and 63rd including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, Cottage Gove, 61st, Prairie and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Lorel
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted due to, street blockage near North Avenue/Lorel.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Avenue, Laramie, Division, Central, and North Avenue, due to police activity near North Avenue/Lorel. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Elizabeth
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Racine, 76th Loomis, and 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Elizabeth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Racine, 76th, Loomis, 79th, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 79th/Elizabeth.

Allow extra travel time.
